name: Allfront-end
tagline: Nicknamed turbo-octo-adventure, an all-in-one resource base for front-end folks.
body: # Tools list for the 2015. Continuous update on the page is on track. ### Playgrounds * [Code Academy](http://www.codecademy.com) * [Code School](http://www.codeschool.com) * [Treehouse](http://teamtreehouse.com) * [Tuts+](http://tutsplus.com) * [Code Academy](http://www.codecademy.com) * [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com) * [SitePoint](http://www.sitepoint.com) ### Frameworks/ Libraries #### Javascript * [Angular](https://angularjs.org) * [Backbone](http://addyosmani.github.io/backbone-fundamentals/) * [MeteorJS](https://www.yauh.de/articles/376/best-learning-resources-for-meteorjs/) * [Ember](http://emberjs.com) * [Knockout](http://knockoutjs.com) * [React](http://facebook.github.io/react/) * [Rivet](http://rivetsjs.com) * [jQuery](http://jquery.com) * [Maria MVC](https://github.com/petermichaux/maria) * [Vue.js](http://vuejs.org) * [DataBinding](http://weblogs.asp.net/dwahlin/javascript-data-binding-frameworks) * [Others](http://www.designyourway.net/blog/resources/a-comprehensive-collection-of-javascript-application-frameworks-28-examples/) #### HTML / CSS * [Best Collections](http://usablica.github.io/front-end-frameworks/compare.html?v=2.0) * [Bootstrap](http://www.bootstraphero.com/the-big-badass-list-of-twitter-bootstrap-resources) * [Bootswatch](https://bootswatch.com) * [FontAwesome for Bootrap](http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/) * [Compass](http://compass-style.org) * [Foundation](http://foundation.zurb.com) * [Workless](http://workless.ikreativ.com) * [Dart](https://www.dartlang.org) * [Golden Grid](http://goldengridsystem.com) * [Responsive Grid System](http://responsive.gs) * [Repix Design](http://store.repixdesign.com) * [Modernizer](http://modernizr.com) * [Framework 7](http://www.idangero.us/framework7/#.VRQeYkb8tOQ) * [HTML5 Boilerplate](http://html5boilerplate.com) * [Normalize.css](http://necolas.github.com/normalize.css) * [Datatables](http://www.datatables.net) * [YUI3](ttp://yuilibrary.com/projects/yui3) * [AlloyUI](http://alloyui.com) * [Sass](http://sass-lang.com) * [Dive into HTML5](http://diveintohtml5.info) #### jQuery Plugins * [Masonry](http://masonry.desandro.com) * [ShapeShift](https://github.com/chixieburr/jquery.shapeshift) * [Aware](http://xoxco.com/projects/code/aware/) * [CollagePlus](http://ed-lea.github.io/jquery-collagePlus/) * [Aware](http://xoxco.com/projects/code/aware/) ### Workflow * [Choose a License](http://choosealicense.com/) ### Conferences * [Codefront](http://codefront.io) #### Submit a Link Feel free to send me a message, or check out this repo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
